title: MetaCat: A Backend Service for DataCite Metadata
description: MetaCat is a specialized, backend service designed to create and manage a catalog of metadata for scientific products. It exposes a pragmatic REST-like API for the entire lifecycle of research metadata — from creation to publication — strictly following the DataCite Metadata Kernel v4.6. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB, featuring JWT/OAuth2 (ORCID) authentication and role-based authorization.
